t: Brand Off Ginza (2025) - All You Need to Know BEFORE You Go (with Reviews)
s: Have seen from Youtube about the Store-branding so we decided to drop by Ginza on a Wednesday evening. Quite easy to reach, about 5 mins of navigating after exiting Ginza station. It is open from 11am onwards. We reached at about 6pm on a weekday. Noted that while it is a 4-storey bldg, stand alone.

t: Amazon.co.uk: GINZA MODE: GINZA MODE NEW
